content.body: where does the `errors` property of `AggregateError` instances come from?
content.formatted_body: where does the errors property of AggregateError instances come from?

content.body: > If all of the passed-in promises reject, `Promise.any` asynchronously rejects with an {{JSxRef("AggregateError")}} object, which extends {{JSxRef("Error")}}, and contains an `errors` property with an array of rejection values.
content.formatted_body: If all of the passed-in promises reject, Promise.any asynchronously rejects with an {{JSxRef("AggregateError")}} object, which extends {{JSxRef("Error")}}, and contains an errors property with an array of rejection values.

content.body: `errors` is not part of the prototype of `AggregateError`, so I don’t understand where it’s coming from
content.formatted_body: errors is not part of the prototype of AggregateError, so I don’t understand where it’s coming from

content.body: looking at the spec at https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/fundamental-objects.html#sec-aggregate-error-objects, I also don’t see any mention of `errors`
content.formatted_body: looking at the spec at https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/fundamental-objects.html#sec-aggregate-error-objects, I also don’t see any mention of errors

content.body:
> <@sideshowbarker:mozilla.org> `errors` is not part of the prototype of `AggregateError`, so I don’t understand where it’s coming from

https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/fundamental-objects.html#sec-aggregate-error Step 5
> `Perform ! DefinePropertyOrThrow(O, "errors", PropertyDescriptor { [[Configurable]]: true, [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Writable]]: true, [[Value]]: ! CreateArrayFromList(errorsList) }).`
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @sideshowbarker:mozilla.org
errors is not part of the prototype of AggregateError, so I don’t understand where it’s coming from

https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/fundamental-objects.html#sec-aggregate-error Step 5

Perform ! DefinePropertyOrThrow(O, "errors", PropertyDescriptor { [[Configurable]]: true, [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Writable]]: true, [[Value]]: ! CreateArrayFromList(errorsList) }).

content.body:
> <@aclaymore:matrix.org> https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/fundamental-objects.html#sec-aggregate-error Step 5
> > `Perform ! DefinePropertyOrThrow(O, "errors", PropertyDescriptor { [[Configurable]]: true, [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Writable]]: true, [[Value]]: ! CreateArrayFromList(errorsList) }).`

d’oh — thanks much, I don’t know how I overlooked that before…
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @aclaymore:matrix.org

https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/fundamental-objects.html#sec-aggregate-error Step 5

Perform ! DefinePropertyOrThrow(O, "errors", PropertyDescriptor { [[Configurable]]: true, [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Writable]]: true, [[Value]]: ! CreateArrayFromList(errorsList) }).

d’oh — thanks much, I don’t know how I overlooked that before…
